MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD8 postcode area of Jedburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30am to replace a broken overhead pole at Pennymuir Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.03am on Wednesday 21st October 2020.
